p: Antiviral activity against enteric coronavirus is exhibited by extracts of two representatives of the Rosaceae family, Rosa nutkunu and Amelunchier alnifoliu, and the respiratory syncytial virus is completely inhibited by Potentillu urgutu root extracts [ 81]. Methanolic extract of the Rosa macrophylla flower shows an inhibition of influenza A/WSN/33 (H 1N 1) virus replication [ 82].
